recipes.name: Spaghetti Bolognese

recipes.name: Chicken Caesar Salad
recipes.instructions: Grill chicken, chop lettuce, mix with croutons, Parmesan cheese, and Caesar dressing.

recipes.name: Vegetarian Stir-Fry
recipes.instructions: Stir-fry tofu and vegetables with soy sauce, ginger, and garlic until cooked.
